ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who distribute (it) by command,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and execute the great task of apportioning (rainfall):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by the angels which distribute the affairs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then by oath of those which distribute by the command.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then those (angels who) distribute blessings by Our command;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those who distribute (blessings) by command,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and distributing the command of God at His behest!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the angels who distribute the affair.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by [the angels] who dispense [livelihood] by [His] command:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And those that distribute and apportion by Command;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those (angels) who distribute (provisions, rain, and other blessings) by (Allah's) Command;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:4] and those that apportion by command: the angels who distribute provisions and the rains and other things across the lands and to [all] servants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those who distribute (blessings) by command) and swears by the angels Gabriel, Michael, Seraphiel and the angel of death who apportion [provisions] for people: Allah swore by all these,
